entities.name: sopophorous bean
entities.description: The sopophorous bean is described as being difficult to cut up. It is mentioned that Harry is trying to crush it with the flat side of a dagger.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to prepare a potion. He is described as turning to Hermione for help and then crushing the sopophorous bean with a dagger.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being busy with her potion, which is still deep purple. Harry asks to borrow her silver knife.

entities.name: silver knife
entities.description: The silver knife is described as something that Hermione has and Harry wants to borrow it to cut up the sopophorous bean.

entities.name: cauldron
entities.description: The cauldron is mentioned as where Harry scoops the juice of the sopophorous bean into. It is also described as being used to hold a potion.

entities.name: textbook
entities.description: The textbook is mentioned as providing instructions for preparing the potion, including what color it should turn.
